title: So what makes Sion such a piece of shit?
body:
I've noticed a lot of Sions aren't doing so well in my games? Is he just too weak early game? I've noticed myself that he's just not very scary in team fights, so I'm able to dodge everything he has pretty much, and early game, my Poppy jungle is MUCH stronger, so I'm able to push him around as I please.

Where would you guys like to see Sion go? What do you like/dislike about him?

{{champion:14}} C'MON! FIIIIGHT!

{{champion:78}} Shut up Sion!

{{champion:14}} Okay...*runs back into the jungle with low hp*
